mapper.insert: insert into menu (menu_id, menu_name, menu_href, menu_parent_id, menu_flag, menu_icon, create_date, update_date) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuHref,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, menu_href, menu_parent_id, menu_flag, menu_icon, create_date, update_date from menu

select menu_id as menuId, menu_name as menuName, menu_href as menuHref, menu_parent_id as menuParentId, menu_flag as menuFlag, menu_icon as menuIcon, create_date as createDate,update_date as updateDate from menu where 1=1
and menu_parent_id = #{value}
select menu_id as menuId, menu_name as menuName from menu where menu_parent_id ='0' and menu_flag = "Y"
